item.title: Docker Compose yml 小技巧
item.description: 設定多個 hosts version: '3.8' x-hosts: &x-hosts - 'mysql:172.29.0.3' - 'app:172.29.0.4' - 'influxdb:172.29.0.5' ... app: extra_hosts: *x-hosts build with context ... app: build: context: . dockerfile: ./.docker/Dockerfile.xxx-xx connect other network bridge # docker-compose-1.yml version: '3.7' ... services: svc1: networks: - custom_name networks: custom_name: # 這邊是類似 namespace 的概念 driver: bridge # docker-compose-2.yml version: '3.7' .
